person.persName: Lilly Tilford Johnson (Married to Major Willa Viley Johnson)

body.p: Born in Lexington, Kentucky. Married Major Willa Viley Johnson, son of Provisional Governor George Washington Johnson, on 22 October 1860. Mother of Emily (Johnson) Allen, George Washington Johnson, and William B. Johnson.
